published.title: Enhanced MobileNetV1 for early autism detection: A transfer learning approach using facial imagery
published.conference: 2025 International Conference on Quantum Photonics, Artificial Intelligence, and Networking (QPAIN)
published.abstract: This research presents an enhanced MobileNetV1 architecture for early autism detection using facial imagery analysis. The study employs transfer learning techniques to improve detection accuracy while maintaining computational efficiency, making it suitable for real-world applications in healthcare settings.
published.citation: K. M. Hasan et al., "Enhanced MobileNetV1 for early autism detection: A transfer learning approach using facial imagery," in 2025 International Conference on Quantum Photonics, Artificial Intelligence, and Networking (QPAIN), 2025, pp. 1–6.

published.title: Advancements in plant disease detection: A comparative study of deep learning-based classification models
published.conference: 2025 International Conference on Quantum Photonics, Artificial Intelligence, and Networking (QPAIN)
published.abstract: This paper presents a comprehensive comparative analysis of various deep learning models for plant disease detection. The study evaluates different classification architectures and their effectiveness in identifying plant diseases from leaf imagery, contributing to precision agriculture and crop management.
published.citation: H. R. Hemel et al., "Advancements in plant disease detection: A comparative study of deep learning-based classification models," in 2025 International Conference on Quantum Photonics, Artificial Intelligence, and Networking (QPAIN), 2025, pp. 1–5.
